title: Royal wedding: pint-sized edition
text:
Royal wedding: pint-sized edition 4:28am IST - 01:45
Reliving the fairy-tale on a small scale, the glittering royal wedding of Prince Harry and Meghan Markle got reimagined kid-sized, in a Toddlewood photo shoot. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
